TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PeerCollaborationPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class PeerCollaborationPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class PeerCollaborationPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type PeerCollaborationPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 指定用于定义 对象权限或在这些权限中使用的值。

span.span: Specifies the values that define or are used in object permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值允许所有本地和 Intranet 区域的应用程序来访问协作服务，并为 Internet 区域的应用程序授予任何权限。The default allow all local and Intranet zone applications to access collaboration services, and no permission is granted for Internet zone applications. 换而言之，如果已更改，所有链接-本地和本地站点的默认权限不都是应用程序有权访问对等协作服务，但全局应用程序没有访问权限。In other words, if the default permissions are not changed, all link-local and site-local applications have access to Peer-To-Peer collaboration services, but global applications have no access. 此类不是派生的。This class is not derivable.

summary.span: 调用构造函数时，将传递此实例的初始 。

span.span: The initial for this instance is passed when the constructor is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型的实例不能访问受权限保护的资源或他们已对这些资源的完全访问权限不受限制。Instances of this type either have no access to the resource(s) protected by the permission, or they have unrestricted full access to those resources. 如果状态为，则实例允许所有请求。If state is , the instance passes all demands. 如果状态包含任何其他值，实例禁止所有命令。If state contains any other value, the instance fails all demands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份实例授予相同的访问权限资源与原始权限。A copy of a instance grants the same access to resources as the original permission.

span.span: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.

summary.span: 表示用于对安全对象进行编码的 XML 对象模型。

span.span: Represents the XML object model for encoding security objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类旨在为简单的 XML 对象模型，用于在安全系统中，而不是针对作为常规的 XML 对象模型使用的轻量实现。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the security system, and not for use as a general XML object model. 此类不能被继承。This class cannot be inherited.

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限求 的权限。

span.span: Permission to with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前 与指定 权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 一个新权限，表示当前 与指定 权限的交集。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限是一个 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: This new permission is a reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述两者共同描述的操作组的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有传递两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 以下语句所需进行`true`的所有实现方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the method. X 和 Y 表示不是对象引用`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X and Y represent object references that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.Intersect(X) 返回的值等于 X。X.Intersect(X) returns a value equal to X. - X.Intersect(Y) 返回 Y.Intersect(X) 相同的值。X.Intersect(Y) returns the same value as Y.Intersect(X). - X.Intersect (`null`引用) 返回`null`引用。X.Intersect(a `null` reference) returns a `null` reference.

exception.span: 目标参数不是一个 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），并且不是与当前权限相同的类的实例。

span.span: The target parameter is not a reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsSubsetOf (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean
public: override bool IsSubsetOf(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool override this.IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前 是否为指定 权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前 是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前如果当前权限指定一组操作完全包含指定的权限是指定权限的子集。The current is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对访问权限"*C:\example.txt*"是表示对访问权限的子集"*c:\\*"。For example, a permission that represents access to "*C:\example.txt*" is a subset of a permission that represents access to "*C:\\*". 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 以下语句所需进行`true`的所有实现方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the method. X、 Y 和 Z 表示对象不是`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X, Y, and Z represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.IsSubsetOf(X) 返回`true`。X.IsSubsetOf(X) returns `true`. - 当且仅当 X 和 Y 表示相同的权限集，X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 返回 Y.IsSubsetOf(X) 相同的值。X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns the same value as Y.IsSubsetOf(X) if and only if X and Y represent the same set of permissions. - 如果两者都返回 X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 和 Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) `true`，X.IsSubsetOf(Z) 返回`true`。If X.IsSubsetOf(Y) and Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) both return `true`, X.IsSubsetOf(Z) returns `true`. 如果 X 表示空[IPermission](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=98303)为无权限状态的对象和 Y 表示一个 IPermission 对象，它`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 返回`true`。If X represents an empty [IPermission](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=98303) object with a permission state of None and Y represents an IPermission object that is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns `true`. 如果 Z 也是空的权限，则复合设置操作 X.Union(Z)。此外返回 IsSubsetOf(Y)`true`因为的两个空权限是空的权限。If Z is also an empty permission, the compound set operation X.Union(Z).IsSubsetOf(Y) also returns `true` because the of two empty permissions is an empty permission.

exception.span: 该参数为 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The parameter is a reference ( in Visual Basic).

summary.span: 返回一个值，指定当前的 是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value specifying whether the current is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对受权限保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情况下，权限类方法由基础结构并不适合应用程序中使用。In general, permission class methods are used by the infrastructure and are not intended for use in applications.

public: override System::Security::IPermission ^ Union(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member Union : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission override this.Union : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前 与指定 权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 一个新权限，表示当前 与指定权限的 。

span.span: A new permission that represents the of the current and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的结果是一个权限，表示由这两个当前的所有操作和指定的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 以下语句所需是`true`Union 方法的所有实现的。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the Union method. X 和 Y 表示对象不是`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X and Y represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.Union(X) 返回具有相同的 X 值的对象。X.Union(X) returns an object that has the same value as X. - X.Union(Y) 返回具有与 Y.Union(X) 返回的对象相同的值的对象。X.Union(Y) returns an object that has the same value as the object returned by Y.Union(X). - X.Union (`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)) 返回具有相同的 X 值的对象。X.Union(a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)) returns an object that has the same value as X.

exception.span: 该参数为 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The parameter is a reference ( in Visual Basic).
